note: Power Scrap Metal, Melbourne is a privately owned and fully licenced scrap metal dealer. We specialise in sorting, dismantling and processing a wide range of scrap metals from various industries. Our services also include export-import, pick up from the seller, recycling and selling a wide range of metals including, aluminium, copper, PVC cables and wires, stainless steel, batteries, brass, bronze, gun metal, lead and electronic motors. For more visit https://www.powerscrapmetal.com.au/
